Description: Twitter is an online news and social networking service where users post and interact with 'tweets', restricted to 280 characters.
Tumblr is a microblogging and social networking service, now part of Oath. The service allows users to post multimedia and other content to a short-form blog.
Facebook is the social networking service operated by Facebook Inc.
VKontakte is an online social media and social networking service, owned by the Russian internet company Mail.Ru.
Qzone is a social networking service developed by Tencent Holding Limited in 2005. It allows users to write blogs, keep diaries, send photos, listen to music, and watch videos.
Baidu PostBar is a communication platform tied to search results operated by the Chinese company Baidu.
